trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux nxUser Resource
trans-unit.target: DSC for Linux nxUser 資源

trans-unit.source: powershell,DSC
DSC for Linux nxUser Resource
trans-unit.target: DSC for Linux nxUser 資源

trans-unit.source: The **nxUser** resource in PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to to manage local users on a Linux node.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 預期狀態設定 (DSC) 的 **nxUser** 資源會提供一個機制，在 Linux 節點管理本機使用者。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
Properties
Property
Indicates the account name for which you want to ensure a specific state.
trans-unit.target: 指出您要確保其特定狀態的帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: UserName
Specifies the location where you want to ensure the state for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定您要確認檔案或目錄狀態的位置。

trans-unit.source: Ensure
Specifies whether the account exists.
Set this property to "Present" to ensure that the account exists, and set it to "Absent" to ensure that the account does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性為 "Present" 以確保帳戶存在，而設為 "Absent" 可確保帳戶不存在。

trans-unit.source: FullName
A string that contains the full name to use for the user account.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要用於使用者帳戶的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Description
The description for the user account.
Password
The hash of the users password in the appropriate form for the Linux computer.
trans-unit.target: Linux 電腦適當表單的使用者密碼雜湊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is a salted SHA-256, or SHA-512 hash.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是「加鹽」過 (在密碼任意固定位置插入特定的字串) 的 SHA-256 或 SHA-512 雜湊。

trans-unit.source: On Debian and Ubuntu Linux, this value can be generated with the mkpasswd command.
trans-unit.target: 在 Debian 和 Ubuntu Linux 上，這個值可使用 mkpasswd 命令產生。

trans-unit.source: For other Linux distros, the crypt method of Python’s Crypt library can be used to generate the hash.
trans-unit.target: 針對其他 Linux 散發版本，Python 的 Crypt 程式庫的 crypt 方法可用來產生此雜湊。

trans-unit.source: Disabled
Indicates whether the account is enabled.
Set this property to **$true** to ensure that this account is disabled, and set it to **$false** to ensure that it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為 **$true** 以確保此帳戶已停用，而設定為 **$false** 可確定已啟用。

trans-unit.source: PasswordChangeRequired
Indicates whether the user can change the password.
trans-unit.target: 指出使用者是否可以變更密碼。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to **$true** to ensure that the user cannot change the password, and set it to **$false** to allow the user to change the password.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為 **$true** 以確保使用者無法變更密碼，而設定為 **$false** 可允許使用者變更密碼。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **$false**.
This property is only evaluated if the user account did not exist previously and is being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前不存在此使用者帳戶，而且正在建立中，才會評估這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: HomeDirectory
The home directory for the user.
GroupID
The primary group ID for the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者主要群組識別碼。

trans-unit.source: DependsOn
Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: 表示必須先執行另一個資源的設定，再設定這個資源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is "ResourceName" and its type is "ResourceType", the syntax for using this property is `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一個想要執行的資源設定指令碼區塊的識別碼是 "ResourceName"，而它的類型是 "ResourceType"，則使用這個屬性的語法就是 `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`。

trans-unit.source: Example
The following example ensures that the user "monuser" exists and is a member of the group "DBusers".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會確保使用者 "monuser" 存在，而且是 "DBusers" 群組的成員。
